artist: Charles Percier; Pierre François Léonard Fontaine; Sèvres Porcelain Factory
description: white porcelain with relief Neo-Classical designs; fruit and flower swags on three sides hang from ram's heads at top corners; Apollo at top front in a chariot drawn by two horses; central clock face; four young women below, with central column topped with two portrait busts; griffon at each corner above base; lyre and rooster on PR side-lyre and owl on PL side; wood base decorated to create brown faux marble finish; slightly asymmetrical
dimension: 17 3/8 x 12 3/8 x 8 in. (44.13 x 31.43 x 20.32 cm) (including attached base)
marks:
Inscription

on clock face, in black: illegible
title: Pendulum clock
